title: Tech workers urge companies to join Ukraine's digital blockade of Russia - Reuters
content: Tech workers urge companies to join Ukraine's digital blockade of Russia  Reuters
description: Microsoft Corp President Brad Smith wrote to Ukraine's leader this month with a clear message: despite Kyiv's calls for it to sever all ties with Russia, the U.S. software behemoth would continue doing business in the country with non-sanctioned clients, including schools and hospitals.
